name: stock_balance_sheet_stock
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mboum_finance.
Tool description: Mboum Finance Official API for stocks, options, ETFs, mutual funds, SEC Data, news, screeners and more! 
API description: Fetches the balance sheet data for a given stock symbol using the mboum-finance API.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve balance sheet data.
